body:
Hi Greg,
Thank you a lot again! Now it works.
Best wishes for you!
Urtza.

Greg Ward <gregoryjward at gmail.com> escribi?:


Hello,?

I am trying to get annual illuminance data. However, I am having problems
with file.smx. I do not know if the weather file .wea it is ok:

C:\Radiance\test\TheThree-PhaseMethodSimulatingCFS_A-McNeil\Example1\All>epw2wea
?USA_IL_Chicago-Midway.AP.725340_TMY.epw Chicago.wea
place Chicago/Midway_USA
latitude 41.78
longitude 87.75
time_zone 90.00
site_elevation 187.0
weather_data_file_units 1

C:\Radiance\test\TheThree-PhaseMethodSimulatingCFS_A-McNeil\Example1\All>gendaym
tx -m 4 Chicago.wea > Chicago.smx


C:\Radiance\test\TheThree-PhaseMethodSimulatingCFS_A-McNeil\Example1\All>dctimes
tep -n 8760 results/photocells.vmx data/singleclear.xml results/south.dmx
Chicag
o.smx > results/illum_clear.dat
fatal - unexpected EOF reading Chicago.smx

The file has 213 MB. Do anyone know what is the problem?
Thanks in advance.
Kind regards,
Urtza.
?

?
